segments.text: I peek in and see the woman focused on her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in her apron, looking like a classic mom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the water pouring from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing right onto the floor in a sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is wet, but she hasn't noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climbing the stool to get to the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet's open, jar full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balancing a plate too; clever kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, hand out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so excited about their secret snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light from the window brightens the garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This feels like a joyful, if risky, family moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope the stool holds steady.
segments.speaker: PAR
